response.overview: In 2020, Argentina regulated the self-cultivation of cannabis. "Burning Borders" is an independent documentary that crosses the border from Brazil, traveling 30,000 km to give voice to activists, specialists and citizens who are key to this process. The film seeks to understand the impact of this decision and discuss how the end of the war on drugs can help heal the open veins of Latin America.
response.title: Queimando Fronteiras
